column2: "Please forgive me for causing you such inconvenience this time."
"It's not a gift of gratitude, but if you'd like, please take this."
"Don't be concerned about me. I was able to confirm my objective. I have no interest in throwing my life away either."
"However, if possible, could you please not disclose what happened today to anyone?"
"And to trouble you with one more thing, there was something I'd like you to remember."
"Right now, I'm still not qualified to use that name, I just wanted someone to remember it..."
"外伝 もうそこにいないわたし"
